episodes.title: So Many "One True" Saving Faith CULT Religions
episodes.description:
Discussing how so many religions claim to be the one true saving faith. Families get divided and marginalized people are treated poorly. Old Apostolic Lutheran Church, Mormon, LDS, Jehovah's Witnesses, Amish, etc etc.

#oalc #religion #mormon #cults #cultpsychology
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: CULT Talk While Making Candles - Talking Cults And Experience Leaving High Control Religions
episodes.description: Random thoughts about cults and my experience leaving a high control religion while I make candles for my sideline candle business. Laestadius, Old Apostolic Lutheran Church, Laestadianism, Cult control, and ramblings.

episodes.title: CULT Riffs - Part 1 | High Control Religion Gaslighting and Fear Of Information Conditioning
episodes.description:
Unscripted riffing about cults and cult psychology. High control religions gaslight people and condition them to fear information.

My interview with A Tippling Philosopher about leaving the religion https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P3iMqRnRpOU

Laestadius, Laestadianism, Old Apostolic Lutheran Church, Mormons, Jehovah's Witnesses, History of Hell, Examine where ideas come from, Man-made constructs.

episodes.title: Why Do You Talk About Your Cult Experiences? High Control Religion | OALC | Laestadian Upbringing
episodes.description: Talking about cults, cult psychology, cult experiences, the Old Apostolic Lutheran Church, Laestadianism, Laestadius, and why people avoid information to avoid the stress of cognitive dissonance. Explaining why I talk about my experiences with a high control religion.
